changes.title: Lagoon 2.28.0 - Harbor 2.13.x Support & Configuration Cleanup
changes.description: Lagoon now supports Harbor version 2.13.x, keeping you current with the latest container registry features. This release also cleans up legacy configurationâ€”the internal_container_registry variable has been removed from the API and database as part of ongoing Harbor deprecation work. Heads up: the QoS-related Helm values (lagoonFeatureFlagEnableQoS, QoSMaxBuilds, QoSDefault) are being phased out. They still work for now, but check out the new options in the lagoon-build-deploy chart before the next release.
